traffic

Interface Connectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EdgeOfMap, Road

    interface Connectable
    Connectable is an interface for connecting two traffic objects together so one may take Vehicles from the other.
    Version:
    2018100500
    Author:
    Richard Barton

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setConnection(Connection incoming, char heading, int lane)
      The setConnection method completes the connection with another Connectable object.
      void vehiclesGoTo(Connectable outgoingTo, char heading, int outgoingLane, int incomingLane)
      The vehiclesGoTo method stitches traffic objects together.

    • Method Detail

      • vehiclesGoTo

        void vehiclesGoTo(Connectable outgoingTo,
                  char heading,
                  int outgoingLane,
                  int incomingLane)
        The vehiclesGoTo method stitches traffic objects together. This method should call the outgoingTo's setConnection method with the proper arguments so the outgoingTo object's Connection can take Vehicles from the proper lane.
        Parameters:
        outgoingTo - The other Connectable object that will be taking Vehicles from this object.
        heading - The direction in which Vehicles are traveling: 'N', 'S', 'E' or 'W'.
        outgoingLane - The lane of this object from which Vehicles will be taken.
        incomingLane - The lane of outgoingTo which will get Vehicles.

      • setConnection

        void setConnection(Connection incoming,
                   char heading,
                   int lane)
        The setConnection method completes the connection with another Connectable object. It should be called by the other Connectable object's vehiclesGoTo method to tell this object how to take Vehicles.
        Parameters:
        incoming - The Connection object from which this object will receive Vehicles.
        heading - The direction in which Vehicles are traveling: 'N', 'S', 'E' or 'W'.
        lane - The lane which will receive incoming Vehicles.
